main event: A report from Project Blue Book detailing a sighting of a huge bright object resembling a shooting star on 8 Feb 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared to break into two pieces before burning up in the atmosphere., The sighting lasted for about 15 seconds., The weather conditions were clear with a full moon., There was only one subject observing the event., The location was in the Philippine Sea.
sighted object: huge bright object resembling a shooting star
witness description: The object was reported to have broken into two pieces before bursting up into the atmosphere.
